item.title: LaTeX Math Formula
item.description:
1 Greek alphabet(Part) display syntax $\alpha$ \alpha $ eta$  eta $\gamma$ \gamma $\delta$ \delta $\epsilon$ \epsilon $\zeta$ \zeta $\eta$ \eta $	heta$ 	heta $\lambda$ \lambda $\mu$ \mu $\pi$ \pi $\sigma$ \sigma $\phi$ \phi $\psi$ \psi 2 Math syntax $$ a 	imes b \ a \div b \ a \pm b \ a \mp b \ a \cdot b \ a \oplus b \ a \otimes b \ a \ominus b \ \infty \ \sqrt{x} \ \sqrt[n]{x} \ \emptyset \ \in \
